content.query:
/* 1) See any active cleanse requests (old or new) */
SELECT request_id, status, total_elapsed_time/1000.0 AS seconds, [label], command
FROM sys.dm_pdw_exec_requests
WHERE [label] IN (N'AP_Cleanse_Insert', N'AP_Cleanse_CTAS')
  AND status IN ('Running','Queued','Suspended')
ORDER BY submit_time DESC;

-- cancel a single request
CANCEL 'QID456031';

SELECT request_id, status, total_elapsed_time/1000.0 AS seconds, [label], command
FROM sys.dm_pdw_exec_requests
WHERE status IN ('Running','Queued','Suspended')
ORDER BY submit_time DESC;


DECLARE @req NVARCHAR(50) = N'QID459011';
SELECT step_index, operation_type, distribution_type, status, total_elapsed_time/1000.0 AS sec
FROM sys.dm_pdw_request_steps
WHERE request_id = @req
ORDER BY step_index;

select distinct studentgroup from transform.AcademicPerformance

select distinct a.studentgroup, sg.studentgroup
   FROM [staging].[AcademicPerformance] a
    LEFT JOIN [dim].[StudentGroup] sg
      ON a.[StudentGroup] = sg.[StudentGroupKey]
